mapper.sql: id, betUser, betNumber, betType, betDate, resultDate, createDate, updateDate, betUserId, resultNumber
mapper.insert: insert into bet_result (id, betUser, betNumber, betType, betDate, resultDate, createDate, updateDate, betUserId, resultNumber) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{betuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{betnumber,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{bettype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{betdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{betuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resultnumber,jdbcType=FLOAT})

insert into bet_result
id,
betUser,
betNumber,
betType,
betDate,
resultDate,
createDate,
updateDate,
betUserId,
resultNumber,

mapper.update:
update bet_result
betUser = #{betuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
betNumber = #{betnumber,jdbcType=FLOAT},
betType = #{bettype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
betDate = #{betdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resultDate = #{resultdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateDate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
betUserId = #{betuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resultNumber = #{resultnumber,jdbcType=FLOAT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bet_result set betUser = #{betuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, betNumber = #{betnumber,jdbcType=FLOAT}, betType = #{bettype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, betDate = #{betdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resultDate = #{resultdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateDate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, betUserId = #{betuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resultNumber = #{resultnumber,jdbcType=FLOAT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(br.betNumber) from bet_result br,open_info oi WHERE cast(oi.id as varchar(50)) = br.resultDate and ${openNo}
